page.title: 01Landscape Around Inverbervie
page.content: Our D block is situated around Inverbervie which is on the north east coast of Scotland. It is quite a hilly area consisting mainly of farmland. The main attraction in our D block is the {Royal Burgh of Inverbervie}with a population of about one thousand two hundred but numbers are rapidly increasing due to new houses being built. By the river is a picturesque {caravan {and camping site}popular with tourists. We have few trees as we are next to the North Sea which means we are affected by a cold sea wind but usually our climate is quite mild especialy in winter. A small part of{Gourdon}village is also included in our D block.
